titleStmt.title: TEI Customization for the ThULB (Thuringian University and State Library) 'base format', used by the project "Editionsportal Thüringen"
Version 1.0
titleStmt.author: Martin Prell (University of Jena)

licence.p: Distributed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 Germany (CC BY-SA 4.0 DE) Licence.

notesStmt.note: This is the current ODD version for the metadata ThULB base format tagset.

moduleRef.include: author bibl biblScope date desc editor label listBibl measure note p pubPlace publisher ref resp respStmt term title

availability biblFull change classCode classDecl correction correspAction correspContext correspDesc edition editionStmt editorialDecl encodingDesc extent fileDesc handNote idno keywords langUsage language licence normalization notesStmt profileDesc publicationStmt punctuation revisionDesc scriptNote seriesStmt sourceDesc taxonomy teiHeader textClass titleStmt
